App.Author: Tomi 'Tol1' Nokkala
App.Description: Application to deliver Irssi's highlight notifications into your phone.
App.AdditionalNotes:
To work this application needs a script found from app's web page to be installed to Irssi. More details can be found by opening the link above.
Thanks to Lauri 'Murgo' Härsilä from idea and the base of Irssi script.
